title: East Surf Cabanas Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Sri Lankan, Ice cream, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. All veg except for fish. Has a separate vegetarian kitchen. Serves vegan options such as salads, soups, rice and curry, in-house-made ice creams, juices and smoothies. Uses fresh local seasonal produce daily. Offers a VVQ (veggie bbq) daily. Free Wi-fi. Deewara Niwasa
